mapper.insert:
SELECT reply_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO reply (replyno, groupno,replyorder,replydepth,recontents,replydate,userno,boardno) VALUES(#{replyno}, groupno_seq.nextval,0,1,#{recontents} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{userno},#{boardno})
mapper.select: SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT r.replyno, r.groupno, r.replyorder, r.replydepth, r.recontents, r.replydate, r.userno, r.boardno, u.usernick FROM reply r, user_table u WHERE boardno = #{boardno} AND r.userno = u.userno AND r.replyorder = 0 ORDER BY replydate ) B ORDER BY rnum DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE replyno = #{replyno}
select R.*, U.usernick from reply R, user_table U WHERE R.userno = U.userno AND boardno = #{boardno} AND R.replyorder = 0 ORDER BY replyno DESC
